purpleculture_pinyin:
chǎn
to shovel; to remove; spade; shovel
перелопатить; удалять; лопата; лопата
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 铲)
Pictophonetic: 産 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
剷除 [ chǎn chú ]: to root out; to eradicate; to sweep away; to abolish
鏟車 [ chǎn chē ]: front loader (vehicle); Classifiers: 台
鏟土機 [ chǎn tǔ jī ]: earth-moving machine; mechanical digger
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 産 [ chǎn ] to give birth
heisig_chinese_memo: A small shovel is a really useful piece of metal.  You can shovel dirt, snow, and even the products at your factory when you want to move them around.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A small shovel is really useful piece of metal.  You can shovel dirt, snow, and even the products at your factory when you want to move them around.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " gold " and " production ", the original meaning is shovel. "Said Wen": "Cai Ye. One said: Ping Tie. From gold, produce sound." The Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Si Xie "Qi Min Yao Shu-Plowing the Field" quoted "Chapter": "The way of raising seedlings is worse than hoeing. It's better than a shovel. The shovel handle is two feet long and the blade is two inches wide, so it can be used for weeding.

" Shovel " can mean flattening. The King of Han Fu "On the Latent-Floating": "(The coffin) nails the nails carefully, cuts off the sluggishness, no chance."

" Shovel " also means eradication and elimination. Tang Li Shu "Zhu Juchuan, a member of Zhongshushe": "The dynasty shovels the shortcomings of the previous generation, and revitalizes the ancient industry."

" Shovel " can also mean an ancient weapon shaped like a shovel. In Ming Dynasty, Mao Yuanyi's "Wu Bei Zhi·Military Assets·Equipment III": "Shovel, a small ruler one foot long, with a blade at the tail to facilitate the back stab."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " gold " and " produce ", the original meaning is shovel.
humanum_full_description:
從「金」，「產」聲，本義為鏟子。《說文》：「鏶也。一曰：平鐵。从金，產聲。」北魏賈思勰《齊民要術‧耕田》引《纂文》：「養苗之道，鋤不如耨，耨不如鏟。鏟柄長二尺，刃廣二寸，以戔地除草。」

　　「鏟」可表示削平。漢王符《潛夫論‧浮侈》：「（棺）釘細要，削除鏟靡，不見際會。」

　　「鏟」也表示鏟除、消滅。唐李紓〈中書舍人朱巨川碑〉：「國朝鏟邇代之弊，振中古之業。」

　　「鏟」還可表示古代形狀似鏟的兵器。明茅元儀《武備志‧軍資乘‧器械三》：「鏟，長小尺一丈，尾有刃，以便後刺。」

Chinese: A small shovel is a really useful piece of metal. You can shovel dirt, snow, and even the products at your factory when you want to move them around.
Meaning: small shovel
Hanzi: 铲
Story: A small shovel is really useful piece of metal. You can shovel dirt, snow, and even the products at your factory when you want to move them around.
Kind: traditional

從「 金 」，「 產 」聲，本義為鏟子。《說文》：「鏶也。一曰：平鐵。从金，產聲。」北魏賈思勰《齊民要術‧耕田》引《纂文》：「養苗之道，鋤不如耨，耨不如鏟。鏟柄長二尺，刃廣二寸，以戔地除草。」 「 鏟 」可表示削平。漢王符《潛夫論‧浮侈》：「（棺）釘細要，削除鏟靡，不見際會。」 「 鏟 」也表示鏟除、消滅。唐李紓〈中書舍人朱巨川碑〉：「國朝鏟邇代之弊，振中古之業。」 「 鏟 」還可表示古代形狀似鏟的兵器。明茅元儀《武備志‧軍資乘‧器械三》：「鏟，長小尺一丈，尾有刃，以便後刺。」
From the sound of " gold" and " production", the original meaning is shovel. "Said Wen": "Cai Ye. One said: Ping Tie. From gold, produce sound." The Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Si Xie "Qi Min Yao Shu-Plowing the Field" quoted "Chapter": "The way of raising seedlings is worse than hoeing. It's better than a shovel. The shovel handle is two feet long and the blade is two inches wide, so it can be used for weeding. " Shovel" can mean flattening. The King of Han Fu "On the Latent-Floating": "(The coffin) nails the nails carefully, cuts off the sluggishness, no chance." " Shovel" also means eradication and elimination. Tang Li Shu "Zhu Juchuan, a member of Zhongshushe": "The dynasty shovels the shortcomings of the previous generation, and revitalizes the ancient industry." " Shovel" can also mean an ancient weapon shaped like a shovel. In Ming Dynasty, Mao Yuanyi's "Wu Bei Zhi·Military Assets·Equipment III": "Shovel, a small ruler one foot long, with a blade at the tail to facilitate the back stab."

鏟字的基本解释

鏟
chǎn
见“铲”。

鏟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǎn］
［《廣韻》初限切，上産，初。］
［《廣韻》初鴈切，去諫，初。］
“铲1”的繁体字。
(1)铲子。
(2)古代形状似铲的兵器。
(3)削平；擦破。
(4)铲除；消灭。
(5)借指掠过，消失。
(6)用锹或铲撮取。
(7)见“鏟球”。
(8)方言。强夺巧取。
(9)通“剗”。参见“鏟馬”。

鏟字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏟； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1320第08
【唐韻】初限切【集韻】【韻會】楚限切【正韻】楚?切，?音剗。【說文】鏶也。一曰平䥫。【韻會】平木鐵器。　又【正韻】與剗同。【木華·海賦】鏟臨崖之阜陸。【杜甫詩】意欲鏟?障。　又損削也。【唐書·高竇傳】埋光鏟采。【?子昂傳】鏟山輦石。　又與產同。【鮑照·蕪城賦】鏟利銅山。　又【廣韻】初雁切【集韻】【韻會】初諫切，?音羼。義同。　又【集韻】齒善切，音闡。【博雅】籤謂之鏟。

Traditional characters for "Shovel 1".
(1) Shovel.
(2) Ancient weapons shaped like shovel.
(3) Flattening; scratching.
(4) Eradication; elimination.
(5) Passing by the finger and disappearing.
(6) Pick up with a shovel or shovel.
(7) See "Tackles".
(8) Dialects. Take it by hand.
(9) Through "刬". See "Shovel Horse".
